title: Struct Finance raises $3.9 million in funding from Antler, Arcanum Capital, others - Economic Times
content:

description: Struct Finance plans to use the fresh capital to build out the tools for institutions to easily customize their interest rate products and compose them with options to construct structured products that are better suited to the profiles of different investors.
